content: 1 1 treble_crochet/double_crochet chain 3 1 pattern treble_crochet/double_crochet chain 1 1 treble_crochet/double_crochet miss 3 sts and in last chain work  stitches are worked in-between shell 4 treble_crochet/double_crochet turn 17 sts clusters/v-stitches/clusters and not in the chain spaces of the v_stitch row see photo below row 3 chain 3 3 treble_crochet/double_crochet in same st as chain 3 then * 3 treble_crochet/double_crochet in the next space between sts of the previous row * repeat from * to * to corner where in the chain space you need to work 3 treble_crochet/double_crochet 3 chain 3 treble_crochet/double_crochet repeat * to * again to final the st work 4 treble_crochet/double_crochet into final st turn 23 sts row 4 chain 3 3 treble_crochet/double_crochet in same st as chain 3 then * 1 treble_crochet/double_crochet 1 chain 1 treble_crochet/double_crochet in the next space between sts of the previous row * repeat from * to * to corner where in the chain space you need to work 1 treble_crochet/double_crochet 1 chain 1 treble_crochet/double_crochet chain 3 1 treble_crochet/double_crochet 1 chain 1 treble_crochet/double_crochet repeat * to * again to final the st work 4 treble_crochet/double_crochet into final st turn 29 sts row 5 - 40 note each row increases by 6 sts repeat alternate row of row 3 and 4 turn on the last row do not fasten_off but start the edg- ing 245 sts © keep calm and crochet on u k 2017 2 edging work along each edge of your shawl except the neck edge in picot st row 1 * chain 2 1 double_crochet/single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook at the base of chain 2 double_crochet/single_crochet into next 2 sts * repeat from * to * until end finish off and weave in ends chart row 1-7 © keep calm and crochet on u k 2017 3
